reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Increasing Access to Quality Family Planning and Sexual and Reproductive Health for women and marginalized groups in Yemen

description.narrative: MSIY's rogramme Increasing Access to Quality Family Planning and Sexual and Reproductive Health for women and marginalized groups in Yemen operates for three years in four governorates of Yemen. The program will improve the access to sexual and reproductiv e health (SRH) services and family planning (FP) counselling and methods for women of reproductive age and marginalized and underserved populations by building on existing MSIY activities such as outreach and social franchise (SF) and introducing new activ ities such as HIV testing in centres. The program will extend access to FP/SRH services to approximately 60000 women (social franchisee clients and outreach clients over three years) from the ?Al Muhamasheen? marginalized group and rural areas in four gove rnorates in Yemen. All together this program will avert 10920 Unintended Pregnancies 1130 Unsafe Abortions and create 47912 CYPs.
